  1. Where did your likes go? Please Read This Thread »

All Time GOAT poll

Discussion in 'UFC Discussion' started by Tachy, Feb 23, 2019.

?

Who is the current GOAT

  1. GSP

    1,540 vote(s)
    35.0%

  2. Fedor

    1,156 vote(s)
    26.3%

  3. Silva

    391 vote(s)
    8.9%

  4. Jones

    1,000 vote(s)
    22.7%

  5. Johnson

    68 vote(s)
    1.5%

  6. Other

    198 vote(s)
    4.5%

  7. Aldo

    47 vote(s)
    1.1%

    With GSP retired now, who do you think is the all time greatest at this time?


    GSP





    Fedor





    Anderson Silva




    Jon Jones






    Mighty Mouse




    Aldo






    If your selection for the greatest fighter of all time is not in the poll, feel free to vote for other explain why.
     
    Last edited: Feb 23, 2019
    Tachy, Feb 23, 2019
    #1

    Just seems like he took the easiest path, and I always thought he was cute concerned about his legacy which meant he ended up almost picking fights he knew he could win or playing it safe

  16. DatSamboKid Black Belt

    Joined:
    Dec 2, 2013
    Messages:
    6,767
    Likes Received:
    16
    Location:
    Muay Khao
    I'll repeat myself:

    GSP is the GOAT,

    26-2 in MMA, 20-2 in the UFC,
    Avenged both loses,
    Holds record for the most UFC title wins (13),
    Tied first for the most UFC title fights (15),
    Tied second for the most UFC wins (20),
    Tied third for the most consecutive UFC title defenses (9),
    Most UFC title defenses in Welter Weight history (9),
    Two division champion,
    Did not lose a round between 2007 (Matt Serra) and 2011 (Jake Shields),
    Second for the most consecutive rounds won (33),
    Won first belt in 2006, last belt in 2018, on top for 12 years,
    Never failed a drug test.
    Retired on top.

    Want more?

    Most wins by 50-45 decisions in UFC history (12)
    Most takedowns landed in UFC History (90)
    Most strikes landed in UFC history (2591)
    Most sig. strikes landed in UFC WW History (1254)
    3rd highest Sig. Strikes defense in UFC history (73.1%)
    3rd highest TD accuracy in UFC History (73.8%) - 1st among wrestlers since the two in front of him are strikers (Robbie and Taleb)

    Anyone who disagrees with GSP being the GOAT, disagrees with facts.
     
    Last edited: Feb 2, 2020
    DatSamboKid, Feb 23, 2019
    #16

  18. TheScorpionDude Get over here! ~~~~~~~~~~~~==>

    Joined:
    May 15, 2014
    Messages:
    9,911
    Likes Received:
    23
    Location:
    NetherRealm
    Another make believe thread.

    The MMA GOAT can only be a HW champ.

    This is not boxing. Boxing takes more skill so it makes sense to compare skills between weight classes.

    This is fighting fighting.

    The GOAT is 100% Fedor. And after Fedor it's not GSP or Anderson, it's someone like Big Nog, or Werdum or Cain.

    GSP is the WW GOAT without a question. MM is the flyweight GOAT, Aldo is the FW GOAT, LW, MW and LHW are up for grabs, although DC is probably the LHW GOAT, and a strong contender at HW too.

    Anderson and Jones just the GOAT cheaters, and that's not a cute nickname, they are the actual GOAT cheaters. Anderson is only second to Jones, and Jones is second to none.
     
    TheScorpionDude, Feb 23, 2019
    #18

    Retired on top

    Click to expand...
    On paper he looks great but GSP was the most boring champ in ufc history.
     
    Da - Flow, Feb 23, 2019

post_text.surface_form: With GSP retired now, who do you think is the all time greatest at this time? GSP Fedor Anderson Silva Jon Jones Mighty Mouse Aldo If your selection for the greatest fighter of all time is not in the poll, feel free to vote for other explain why.
St Pierre. Cleaned out his division several times... Then moved up and beat a guy with the most UFC wins to be 185 champ... Champ-Champ... GOAT... #Hespect

I kind of soured a little bit on GSP when he went after Bisping Just seems like he took the easiest path, and I always thought he was cute concerned about his legacy which meant he ended up almost picking fights he knew he could win or playing it safe
Since Artem didn't make the list, Jones
In before 500 pages of yelling

Kung Fu Tze said: ↑ St Pierre. Cleaned out his division several times... Then moved up and beat a guy with the most UFC wins to be 185 champ... Champ-Champ... GOAT... #Hespect Click to expand... Just imagine if Mighty Mouse weighed 155 or 170 pounds
dormammu said: ↑ Since Artem didn't make the list, Jones Click to expand... I shit the bed there
Having Johnson over Aldo is dishespetchful. He beat mainly men equivalents of soccer moms.
Undisputed, untainted GOAT.
That is obviously Fedor. The gap down to Anderson is quite big.
Aldo.
Tachycardia said: ↑ I always thought he was cute Click to expand... He is a handsome devil. I can't argue against that.

Tachycardia said: ↑ I shit the bed there Click to expand... Ufcpoopyshorts.gif Honestly, I think everyone on the list(besides Johnson) could be considered GOAT. But, Jones was blessed with that reach and picograms of steroids pulsing through his veins. #bless
Tony Robbins’ Trampoline said: ↑ Having Johnson over Aldo is dishespetchful. He beat mainly men equivalents of soccer moms. Click to expand... I agree
Aldo deserves a mention

I'll repeat myself: GSP is the GOAT, 26-2 in MMA, 20-2 in the UFC, Avenged both loses, Holds record for the most UFC title wins (13), Tied first for the most UFC title fights (15), Tied second for the most UFC wins (20), Tied third for the most consecutive UFC title defenses (9), Most UFC title defenses in Welter Weight history (9), Two division champion, Did not lose a round between 2007 (Matt Serra) and 2011 (Jake Shields), Second for the most consecutive rounds won (33), Won first belt in 2006, last belt in 2018, on top for 12 years, Never failed a drug test. Retired on top. Want more? Most wins by 50-45 decisions in UFC history (12) Most takedowns landed in UFC History (90) Most strikes landed in UFC history (2591) Most sig. strikes landed in UFC WW History (1254) 3rd highest Sig. Strikes defense in UFC history (73.1%) 3rd highest TD accuracy in UFC History (73.8%) - 1st among wrestlers since the two in front of him are strikers (Robbie and Taleb) Anyone who disagrees with GSP being the GOAT, disagrees with facts.
jei said: ↑ He is a handsome devil. I can't argue against that. Click to expand... Lol iPad dictation fucks me again

Another make believe thread. The MMA GOAT can only be a HW champ. This is not boxing. Boxing takes more skill so it makes sense to compare skills between weight classes. This is fighting fighting. The GOAT is 100% Fedor. And after Fedor it's not GSP or Anderson, it's someone like Big Nog, or Werdum or Cain. GSP is the WW GOAT without a question. MM is the flyweight GOAT, Aldo is the FW GOAT, LW, MW and LHW are up for grabs, although DC is probably the LHW GOAT, and a strong contender at HW too. Anderson and Jones just the GOAT cheaters, and that's not a cute nickname, they are the actual GOAT cheaters. Anderson is only second to Jones, and Jones is second to none.
I’ll add Aldo

Retired on top Anyone who disagrees with GSP being the GOAT, disagrees with facts. Click to expand... On paper he looks great but GSP was the most boring champ in ufc history.
